description: Welcome the blessings on Christmas Eve with this Pomegranate&nbsp;Martini recipe. This drink is not only visually appetizing, the taste also doesn’t disappoint and will leave you wanting for more!
name: Pomegranate Martini

recipeInstructions.name: In a shaker, put your ice, pomegranate juice, vodka, triple sec, club soda and lemon juice.
recipeInstructions.text: In a shaker, put your ice, pomegranate juice, vodka, triple sec, club soda and lemon juice.

recipeInstructions.name: Cover and shake for 10-15 seconds or until the outside of the shaker is slightly frosty.
recipeInstructions.text: Cover and shake for 10-15 seconds or until the outside of the shaker is slightly frosty.

recipeInstructions.name: Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish before serving.
recipeInstructions.text: Strain into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish before serving.
